OneTitle and HomeSmartNY Launch Groundbreaking Partnership
Partnership will bring information and training on title insurance to housing counselors from over 70 housing counseling agencies and their clients across New York State
September 28, 2015 – OneTitle National Guaranty Company, Inc. ( www.onetitle.com ) and HomeSmartNY ( www.nyscxhe.org ) announced a groundbreaking partnership to bring information and training on title insurance to housing counselors from over 70 housing counseling agencies across New York State as well as their clients.
This announcement is another step in OneTitle’s continuing effort to make homes and mortgages more affordable in New York State by reducing title-related closing costs. OneTitle also announced earlier this month that Gail Kresge joined the company as Vice President, bringing her extensive industry experience and long tenure at the State of New York Mortgage Agency (SONYMA) where she worked to help New Yorkers purchase homes.
Daniel C. Price, President and CEO of OneTitle, said, “OneTitle is thrilled to be working with HomeSmartNY and its members throughout New York State. We both share a commitment to sustainable homeownership through education and both believe strongly that quality consumer education can make a difference. HomeSmartNY’s mission to help New York homebuyers make smart financial choices is a great fit with OneTitle’s mission to bring lower rates and better service to New York consumers.”
On October 20th, OneTitle will present an exclusive webinar for HomeSmartNY members to discuss the role that title insurance, title issues, and title-related closing costs play in the home purchasing process. HomeSmartNY members and others interested in joining the webinar should contact Susan Belanich ( This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it. ).
OneTitle will also participate in HomeSmartNY regional chapter trainings and direct-to-consumer homebuyer education classes over the next several months, providing information to members and the borrowers they serve.
For further information about OneTitle National Guaranty Company’s products, services and lower premiums or the partnership with HomeSmartNY, contact Gail A. About OneTitle National Guaranty Company, Inc.
OneTitle National Guaranty Company, Inc. is a direct title insurance underwriter that saves homeowners, homebuyers and investors 20% or more on most transactions. By working directly with real estate attorneys, lenders, investor and homeowners—without any middlemen or intermediaries—OneTitle is able to offer an unbeatable level of service and significantly improve safety and security for the company’s clients. OneTitle clients have direct, immediate access to the ultimate underwriting decision makers. OneTitle is licensed by the New York State Department of Financial Services and backed by a significant reinsurance treaty. For more information, visit www.onetitle.com .
About HomeSmartNY
HomeSmartNY is New York State’s largest network of professional, unbiased, nonprofit homeownership advisors for homebuyers who want to be smart about buying and owning a home. They deliver trustworthy, up-to-the minute classes and one-on-one coaching that puts homebuyers fully in charge of the complex process of choosing a Realtor, selecting a home, finding the best financing, and being prepared to succeed at homeownership in the long term. HomeSmartNY trains more than 15,000 New Yorkers a year to be expert homebuyers. For more information, visit www.nyscxhe.org .
